title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Former Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull has blasted the Liberal Party for failing to address climate change and develop a "coherent national energy policy". In his first major interview since the May election, Mr Turnbull branded the situation a "lose-lose", because Australians were paying higher power bills and carbon emissions were increasing. He insisted a true conservative would support reducing emissions and added that his biggest regret was failing to secure a new national energy policy. Image: News Corp Australia
